reviews.title: Good basic hotel
reviews.text: This a a basic hotel, nothing fancy. Clean, quiet, good breakfast, close to the highway. I think they probably do a lot of tour bus business. Staff is OK, but limited English.
Hotel is about 10 minute drive from Balzano city center. Not really walkable. There is probably a bus connection that comes close. You really should have a car (or tour bus).
reviews.title: Nice stopover, but not long stay
